name: Pokémon Elegant Emerald
overview: Introduction: After almost two years of learning how to hack, I've decided to release my first project. This is a 386 hack of Pokémon Emerald with some cool added features. Features: • 386 Pokémon available • Running shoes inside • Fixed Pomeg glitch • Fixed PNRG • Eggs hatch at level 1 • Nidorina and Nidoqueen put in the MONSTER FIELD egg group like the rest of its evolutions • Pokémon only available by trade evolution now available without trading • Eevee now evolves to Espeon and Umbreon using Sun and Moon Stones • Two new evolution methods not previously available in gen III have been added • TM's are reusable and only obtainable once per game • New multichoice boxes have been added • Nintendo Style legendary Pokémon battles • All gen I-III Items (except certain key items) available in-game • Gym leaders, Elite 4 and Rivals have altered teams • All in-game trades have been altered • Some held items have been altered • All gen I-III berries available • Gen 4 Physical/Special Split • Moves have a Physical/Special/Status symbol next to power on the move screen • All Pokémon now have their FireRed Leafgreen movesets • Loads of trainers Pokémon teams have been heavily changed • Team Magma and Aqua have a wider range of Pokémon in their teams • All four of Deoxys' forms available
